function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited internet access for households in the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS)","Impact":"Difficulty in accessing essential services such as remote therapies and online consultations with doctors, especially for older people","Mitigation":"Improving internet infrastructure and providing training programs for older people to use information and communication technologies effectively","Technologies":"Improvement in high-speed internet infrastructure, development of user-friendly ICT interfaces for older people","People":"Households in the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS), older people","Owner":"Internet service providers, government initiatives"},{"Description":"Economic fallout leading to increased poverty and malnutrition in Central Asian countries","Impact":"High number of people losing monthly incomes, increased poverty, and malnutrition","Mitigation":"Implementing financial support programs, creating employment opportunities, and ensuring food security through government intervention and aid","Technologies":"Economic support systems, job creation initiatives, food distribution networks","People":"Individuals in Central Asian countries, especially those with low income","Owner":"Government authorities, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Increase in human-to-human interaction due to delivery and public services, risking the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Higher potential for the transmission of contagious diseases due to increased human-to-human interaction during delivery and public service transactions","Mitigation":"Implementing contactless delivery systems, enhancing hygiene practices in public services, and promoting the use of protective measures such as face masks and sanitizers","Technologies":"Contactless delivery technology, automated public service systems, promotion of hygiene and protective measures","People":"Workers in delivery services, customers using public services","Owner":"Businesses and organizations providing delivery services, government authorities"}]}
